mapper.insert: insert into product (pno, product_name, product_price, product_won, product_category, product_tag) values (SEQ_PRODUCT.nextval, #{product_name }, #{product_price }, #{product_won }, #{product_category }, #{product_tag })
insert into product_add (product_icon, product_info, product_max_qty, pno, product_img) values (#{product_icon }, #{product_info }, #{product_max_qty }, #{pno }, #{product_img })
mapper.select: select product.*, product_add.product_img from product, product_add where product.pno = product_add.pno and product.product_category='bag'
select product_add.* from product, product_add where product.pno=product_add.pno
